name: Olinda Sob Rodas
description:
It is a Time Attack mode game that portrays the difficulties of a wheelchair user in the streets of the city of Olinda. This game was made during my college time, with the course coordinator orienting the team, with the idea to make a partnership with the city major to publish it around the city, like in shoppings.

It was developed during a marathon of games of 2018, and winner of the same.

Also published in: blogs.ne10.uol.com.br
